"""
        Test that a ClientConnectionNotOpen exception is raised when trying
        to verify a signature on an unopened client connection.
        """
client = ProxyKmipClient()
args = [b'\x01\x02\x03\x04', b'\xff\xff\xff\xff']
kwargs = {'uid': '1', 'cryptographic_parameters': {}}
self.assertRaises(ClientConnectionNotOpen, client.signature_verify, *args,
    **kwargs)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
